A woman who hates cats (Alice Krige) and her son (Brian Krause) have moved into a small town, and must deal with a mean cat. The film, based on Stephenie Meyer’s novel Midnight Sun, centers on 17-year-old Katie Price, sheltered at home since childhood with a rare disease that makes sunlight deadly, and her relationship with society's rays, but also a sensitive classmate who reaches her from the light of the moon.
